document.full_text: latin pop star ricky martin was honored by media group glaad for his work as a role model at a gala held on saturday where he urged people to spread gay rights throughout latin america.
document.title: ricky martin gets top award by glaad
lines_and_colors: latin pop star ricky martin was honored by media group glaad for his work as a role model at a gala held on saturday where he urged people to spread gay rights throughout latin america.
